title: The new cheaters forgeries, detected, disclaimed; by Will. Prynne Esq; a bencher of Lincolns Inne.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed for Edward Thomas at the Adam and Eve in Little Brittain,
notes: A repudiation of various pamphlets published under Prynne's name or initials, but not written by him, and in particular of "One sheet, or If you will a winding sheet for the good old cause" by W.P.,  and "Mola asinaria", actually written by Samuel Butler.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
